content.question: Which of the following resulted from the mass production of cotton described in the excerpt?

choices.label: Southern planters eventually sought to diversify the crops they grew.
Some southerners relocated their plantations to the west of the Appalachian Mountains.
A cotton gin was developed that processed raw cotton more quickly.
Southerners supported protective tariffs to stimulate the United States economy.

content.answer: Some southerners relocated their plantations to the west of the Appalachian Mountains.

topic.text: 4.13: The Society of the South in the Early Republic

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
